Great for finding deals Love the kayak all, it's so easy to use. Helps you find deals you wouldn't have seen otherwise just surfing the web
Saved me money Special mobile rates have already saved me hundreds. Simple to use, sortable searches, and discounts for using the mobile app.
Love this app I love this app for the flight tracker functionality- to quickly track and view flight status. Also a great app for planning trips!!
Works perfectly Easy to use and always gets the most flight info!
One stop shopping! I like the ability to do cars, hotels, and flights all in one place. It is also very efficient doublecheck car rental prices on a regular basis.
Great app for browsing Provides a convenient interface to search for travel options
Better deals Kayak has better deals and I love the fact it will alert you about price drops for specific tickets.
Met my needs Easy to use search options. Clear results with many options! Made my search simple.
One of the best ones out there! My go to app/site for searching flights. Allows you to customize so you can find just what you need. And it's fast. Winner.
So easy! I am constantly booking travel for myself and my boss and this app makes it easy! So fast and simple to navigate. Would be lost with out it!
Perfect I've used some of the other paid apps for organizing travel, and this one is far and above better for a frequent international business traveler like me.
Love it! We do a lot of shopping for travel and this app makes it quick and easy to determine best options for airlines and dates for travel.
Awesome app Easy to use, searches multiple sites to give you many options.  This is my go to app whenever I have travel plans to make.
My go to travel app This app has never let me down. Countless trips and money saved! Very user friendly interface and displays full price!
Very useful app I like that you can track many flights at a time. It notifies you when the rate goes up or down. It's easy to use. Very useful.
My go to for travel When looking for flights this is the only app I use. It's easy and shows me all the available options. Love it!

KAYAK is my go-to! I absolutely love the Explore feature of KAYAK! It's so helpful and eye-opening to allow me to discover new places I may not have considered traveling to! But let's be honest, I'll go anywhere.
Good 'n easy. Easy to use. Had it on my previous phone. Seems like there used to be a way to save flights to review later. Miss that. Otherwise it's a great app!

Less Efficient Than Website Missing functionality of the website. Primarily it won't search prices for nearby airports and won't search for flights with flexible dates (+/- 3 days). It also doesn't provide the price trend. Not going to waste my time doing multiple searches with the app when the website does so much more all with a single search.
Real great Real great. Love search options and all other features. Far superior to other apps of same purpose. Only thing I would like to see is price alerts for specific filters, not just dates.

Update ultimately crashes At first, I tried to update the app through the App Store. Kept getting the message that the update was no longer available for purchase. So, then I deleted the Kayak app and re-downloaded it. That went fine. But now, the app opens for 1 second, then closes. At least I won't need to worry about the update notification in the App Store. Please fix.
As good as expected Just what I like about kayak's website.  Easy to navigate, quick and accurate data.  Definitely recommended.
My Go-To flight app Has everything I need to check flights and travel resources and in an easy to navigate format.  Fast, efficient, reliable. Love it.
Great app Provides most information of all hotel booking apps I've found. Easiest to use. Most car prices and up-to-date features and pictures of places to stay.
Geat app I've been using it several times and really enjoying the prices and flexibility that I can easily see just spending less then 5 mins
Fairly Easy, Saves time. Comparable to other online sites, seems to be simple and straightforward when using. I regularly use this app whenever making travel plans.
Very helpful and very quick When I need to check any car or flight booking this app is my first check and trusted.
Love It!!! Fantastic app!!!  I use it for all of my trip planning. I also use it to help friends who are searching for travel plans!!  I tell everyone about one of my favorite apps!
So convenient! So practical and easy to use! I check at least three times a week for deals from my phone
Great App Never have I seen a search application this robust and easy.  I have booked flights, hotels, and cars from this app. I recommend this app if you want a good bargain for travel.  Thanks.
Fantastic app I love Kayak, and this application makes Traveling and finding the best prices all over the world so easy. I highly recommend this app for research and booking at your fingertips!
Does what you expect... This app loads quickly and has all the information you need for booking travel; on the go.

Fast and handy I will probably not ever buy plane tickets over phone, but to get a quick look on the current ticket prices to international destinations, this us the best app out there! Over LTE, it just breezes through search. Love it.
Great App!!   A must have!! Everything you need to plan, modify, or research about trips from your iPhone.
More than I expected! The information & the detail of that information blows every other search engine (ie tripadvisor, Expedia) out of the water.
Easy and efficient!! This app is very easy for me to look up and purchase flights and/or hotels on my mobile device

Must Have for any business traveler This is better than trip it as I've used that before with many issues. Kayak is streamless and causes me so much less headache as I travel 12 days out of the month on average.

So easy This app is so easy and fast to use. I can see why it has such great reviews. It takes me two minutes to check flight prices!
Amazing Travel App!!! If you need to handle all of your travel arrangements in one App, Kayak makes it happen in an easy to use way without unnecessary complication.  It hasn't let me down.

Great app a must have for those who travel I use regular version of kayak all the time for my trips and having it on my iPhone just makes it super convenient.
My go to travel app. Very useful and easy to use. I travel for work and am constantly searching for flights, hotels and rental cars. I use kayak weekly if not daily.

Most Used App! Love the app, it actually has better filters for search results than the full site online! Now get one especially for iPad!
Wonderful So far one of the best, easy to use fast clean cut to the point, I would like to see some kind of deals hunter with the next upgrade, it would be really nice

Awesome and easy to use  App! Straight forward and very easy to navigate! Almost easier than the website IMHO. Highly recommend you give it a try!

Very useful app! This site was very easy to use and navigate around. I also like all the reviews that I can look through before I book.

Essential Works great on on angles of traveling! Would recommend to anyone who is  a multi tasker or would like to be more efficient at plaining a trip, or wants peace of mind/ reassurance... To sum it up this app has your back :)

Very handy app I travel a lot and was wishing for kayak app to be at my disposal to get an idea about tickets. This app just came in time and now I am a regular user. Very interesting UI design by app engineers. Definitely a hit.

Superb Production Really well done. I have been disappointed that United Airlines hasn't released an iPhone app, until I discovered all the tools in the Kayak app. Now I no longer need them to - This thing is sweet!
One of best travel apps! And it's free!

Prefer it over the desktop version! Almost... But it is a great app and the only thing I use to search for flights from my iPhone. It's fast and flexible
Easy an dependable Been using Kayak for many years. It's one of the few that retains its simplicity through many updates. Five stars!

Gold Star I've used Kayak since it's inception. I've booked entire trip for 5 lasting up to 4-5 weeks. Everything you need is right at your fingertips for e fantastic affordable adventure. I highly recommend it.

friggin sick used it to find deals on hotels while traveling around the PNW and it did just that. wish i knew about this app on previous trips

No BS.  Serves info not BS Prices and times and no BS.   Should be your gold standard for time invested to quality of results.  Can be beat,   But not without a large amount of net grinding, and not a huge beat.

Love this app! Easy to use, love the feature that allows me to search for destinations all over the world by month from my home airport to find best deals.
Easy to use and fast So easy to use and fair. It shows you what other search engines are offering on the same deal. So many filters to specify what I need. Great app!
Great apps This is my 1st place to check for price and flight options when planning for multi-city trips.  The apps is as good as the desktop version. Love it!

Very convenient app! I often use this app when I plan my trip.

Gets me out of trouble Maybe is my old OS on iphone4s but this app is very useful, it's very easy to get information from it quickly. Great temporary replacement when not I front of a PC or Mac.
Excellent app!! Anytime I search flights all over the world, it gives me the best deals to choose from. Been using this site for the past 10yrs. üòÉ!!
Very convenient and intuitive As the title suggests, this app is very convenient and intuitive to use. It makes it very easy to check for flights on the go.

Fix the flexible days part This used to be a good app. Now it is close to useless for my purposes.  I love the flexible dates feature on travel sites, and the one on this app used to work, but no longer does.  Until that gets fixed I will no longer use this app.

Packing List Gone!? No more packing list!?  I had all my various types of trips saved in this app and relied on the packing list for every one (fishing, business, leisure, hunting, etc.). Now it appears they're all lost. What a simple feature to retain, and for some reason Kayak chose to get rid of it. What a bonehead move.

If I could give zero I would We selected a room for 4 people and after we gave our cc# kayak kicked us over to Priceline and stuck us into a room with 1 king bed.  How are we supposed to fit 4 of us into 1 king bed?  Called the hotel and they refused to switch us even if we paid the difference.  So we are stuck with this 1 bed and we are dissatisfied customers.  Will not use again.
Perfect This makes traveling at least 100x easier. Would recommend to anyone and everyone.
Great app Very convenient for my flight purchases. All 5 of them, I'll  recommend this app or website to anyone taking a trip! #5starsforflights

Slow, flawed, not worth the space it takes I've uninstalled and reinstalled this app several times hoping for improvement and no such luck. It is extremely slow and glitchy. I think I've only managed to complete a search or two without an error.
Easy to use I find it an easy site to use, it gives a lot of options, but have found cheaper flights on the airline sites sometimes.
Perfection Far better than the Expedia app executed perfectly. I have not seen any bugs so far and it has not froze etc. Must have if you travel.

Keeps crashing This is a great application, but it started to crash every time we go to the world map.  Have already removed and reinstalled the app and it still crashes.  Please fix this soon.    Once that Is fixed, I would say this is 5star app
Best Travel App Best travel app, but may not be the best deal. Ideal if you don't need bottom line prices since the app is so easy to use that it's quickest just to purchase through it.

Does some things even better than the website. Mobile Kayak is my go-to site. Great flight searching.

Very handy app The features are very accessible, and it seems to work just as well as the website, maybe better.

Kayak's app is simple & swift! This is a pretty great travel app that I think will work well for most travelers. I'm used to using Kayak's website but the app is now my preferred method. Be excellent to each other! *guitar riff*
Fast and reliable I am a frequent last minute flyer and this app allow me to fit my last min. flights and hotels in a painless and convenient way.
Amazing App This is an incredible App. I don't even use my desktop or laptop now I just use the app and quickly booked two flights from Europe to the US.
This site rocks Beware. This site is the best travel search and booking site for mobile.
Key to travel Use kayak all the time to quickly check other flights when traveling.

False flight tracking information I foolishly relied on the app for information about when my girlfriend's 1.5hr flight would arrive, and found while waiting at the airport that it had been delayed 40 minutes longer than the app had claimed. It only updated to display the correct information after the alleged arrival time had passed. Disgraceful.

Missing variables The web solution asks for children age, while this app does not, therefore the prices shown differ to the point that the web results are usually cheaper. Need to fix this issue on the app ASAP.

Limited Functionality I just got this app for my 3rd generation iPad thinking It would be great. My first search, I tried looking up a flight from Detroit to Boise. Everything was smooth.. Then.

Awesome idea. Crashes every time I use it. The interface looks awesome, it's very accessible and easy to use, but the app crashes after every search. I can get as far as seeing the lowest rate- but if I try to scroll through the list, the app  shuts down. It's like having a huge amazing trampoline with really worn out springs. Jump all you want, this apps got nothin (til the bugs are worked out).

Great set of tools Lots of great features and tools for the traveller. Could be a little bit faster but it is faster than some other travel apps. It's free and has a flight tracker and simple guides if you plan on traveling get this app
interface + content are amazing! so much more functional and user friendly than every other travel app I've tried. kudos, kayak!
Awesome app This is easy and very handy to use and more than anything, search speed and number of option choices are amazing!

Love Kayak Have lived off their website to plan/book my trips for both work & personal. Now with app I have quick accesses to trip planning at my finger tips.
Great all over the globe Fantastic! Was able to see and book hotels in real time while traveling in Asia, sometimes at lower rates than calling the hotel directly.
Why look anywhere else? You have two smart options, kayak or the actual proprietor's website. Got the best deals on kayak every time.
The BEST deals... Always! I've spent hours searching every site, and Kayak has had the best deals every single time. Now, I skip all the other sites and just go straight to Kayak!

Don't travel without it! I love to travel and kayak makes sure I get to do it at the best price without wasting time searching every travel site on the Internet.

Slow but Ok Took forever to download my trip itenerary.  Won't let me change my trip name. There's a box to type in but the cursor doesn't start blinking when you tap inside it to type. Review will change to higher rating when fixed.

I'd like to see hotel/airfare/car combos for all over the world. Currently I use several sites for that, would love for it all to be in one app!
Time slider I love the ability to use the time slider to pick my needed departure and arrival times.  Eager to learn more about the other features.  This is the only app I use for planning flights.

Perfect....but! I was planning a trip to Vegas and some of the total costs that were displayed were not the total costs that the websites were giving! Other than that it's easy to use and has a wide array of selections!!!!! I really luv it!

Great way to save. I dont fly a lot but with this app i was able to find something whenever i had free time. Pretty easy to use and fast.

My go to flight app! This is my go to flight now. Been using it for five years. And it's always been reliable and consistent.

So easy and uncluttered! I love how you can select a specific date, but have the option to look for flights +/- 1 to 3 days

Easy I love this app. So easy to use and it makes finding flights readily accessible and even book them through app!

Needs to work on items infirmation Information on items selected is poor not the same you can see on web, as for ex. Hotel don't show type of bed or cars don't show which models are in that categories.

Should have just left it alone!!! What did you do to the app? All messy and confusing now! Some flight times are even cut off as if there's not enough room. For example the time may display like this "10:...". That's horrible. Can't your App programmers do better than that??? Please fix.

Great App just love it!! This app helps me with all my travel needs. When it comes to travel Kayak does it right.  Everything is at your fingertips. Love it!!
Easy Very fast! And accurate I was able to find a flight quick and easy.

Limited search It won't let me search anymore because I exceeded my search allowance. It is not really free because they want you to purchase the apps after you exceeded your search or else, you have to wait I don't know how long before you can search flights again.
Amazin This is a amazing app! It does everything as advertised. Searches take minutes to find anything. Recommend to all
Great all-in-one travel resource Not only does this app give you airfare alerts, but it is a good travel resource for things like packing lists, flight tracker, and more.
Easy, fast, powerful! All the functionality of the website in a fast app on your phone!
Awesome app Been checking prices in southbeach weekly to see how the summer is so far.. It has a few different networks it checks for prices...
Easy to use This app is simple, but you can do a lot with it. In fact, I may prefer its format to that of the website!
Great interface Though not identical to the website version but containing sufficient info for a quick view
Easy, clean, fast!!!! This app is faster and more user-friendly than any other travel booking website that I ever came across. I love love love this app!!!!
Always use this app I always use this app when booking travel. Quick, easy, and always the cheapest!
It works! A couple times of listed flights and when I selected one and the "no flights found" screen came up, so I searched again and it worked. Good app! Thanks!

Latest Version Crashes Constantly Newest version just released does not work properly. Searches fine and finds flights, but when it finishes the search, it then does not display any results in the results screen, and then promptly crashes. It did this multiple times. I'm using an iPhone 3G with latest OS. This has a major bug.
Kayak is great I use it all the time to look up available flights and always find great prices

Easy to use It's great for saving money. It just needs to have hot tub as an amenity option. It only has pool or spa, neither of which guarantee a hot tub. I have to read the comments or scroll the pictures or google the hotel's actual website.
Best traveling app! So easy to navigate, has saving options and files to save flights under. Best traveling app hands down!
Excellent I use it all the time, booking travel on the go from all over the world. Don't know what I would do without it.
Necessity I use this app regularly and always get great deals. It's been a few years that I have used it and like it a lot.
Not finding any faults with this app It's an amazing app. I like the layout and the speed of the app. The app doesn't crash or hang that while using.
This is so great! Wow this app is way better with the recent update! I would totally recommend downloading Kayak they always provide great prices.
Keeps crashing This latest update keeps crashing when I try to work with the dates. Looks nice but isn't functional.
Great prices!! This is the best travel app. I got prices on here that I couldn't find anywhere else. I just bought a one-way ticket from Los Angeles to London for $355. Amazing!
Convenient and easy to use Super helpful and always new updates that are raising the bar
Usefull app I think this is a great app to check the prices and the availability of flights. Although I haven't purchase a ticket through this app yet, I think it's going to work perfectly
Missing taxes included option Wish the app would included taxes and fees to more easily compare hotels. I thought this used to be the case but now it's a pain.
Kayak da best My go-to travel app for planning flights.  Super  efficient and I love saving my searches so it can let me know own when the price changes
My Go To Flights App I've been using Kayak since it first appeared on the scene.  Except for Southwest and some obscure low-cost European airlines this is what I come back to for booking air.

Switch and bait Twice in one day, I was baited into booking a hotel room in Vegas. Both times (about 5 hrs between) showed that my booking failed because the room was not available and the staff offered me the same room for 20% more. promised to contact me with the similar room; however, I have not received anything after 12 hrs of waiting.
Excellent I've been using kayak for years and it's the only way I book flights now. It always finds me the best deals!
Excellent and user friendly Excellent app for deals and lots of options to customize your preferences and needs
kayak ...love it! i tried a number of apps before choosing Kayak, this is the only app that tracked my cruises without having to enter them manually.  love it!
Reliable My go to for all travel planning. Always accurate and trustworthy for getting the best deals.
Could be expanded I was hoping to use this app to supplement planning for a cruise I booked but can't seem to book a hotel on both ends of the cruise.
Great App ! This app deserves 5 stars I always book my flights from here great prices and every airline can't complain at all ! I suggest it 100%
Quick n helpful I like knowing when to buy and when to wait. This app is great help knowing current prices.

Good but... I've always like kayak but it would be helpful if you would allow price alerts to be set for multi city travel! I rarely stay in one place when I travel and can't see the best deals with no price alert.
Fine app Sometimes the pricing is a little weird but overall great service that Kayak provides
Valuable Travel App I'm always happy to use Kayak when making my travel plans. Never disappointed.
Sees all Great way to see the travel costs across multiple airlines, hotels and rental cars.  I find it a necessity in today's self booking and delayed filled world.
Great flight status function Great flight status function. Easy to use.
Good app - saves money Great app - even better with the explore option. You can find amazingly good fares and hotel deals! 5 stars
Use often for travel planning Kayak is definitely my go to app/website.
Easy to use Great site for checking on travel options
Great App! Easy to use and has great filters to help me find what I'm looking for. My "go to" app when I'm looking for flight and car rental info!
Easy to use, reliable Easy and convenient app for travel booking. Super reliable and great user interface.
Best flight search app The easiest, most user friendly and thorough flight search app out there.
Works like it should Maybe it would be cool to have trip duration filter. Seems to only have leg filters.
Super quick and easy to use! My go to app and site for all business and personal travel.
It is...!! It pretty good, quick on finding what I'm looking for and easy to switch from flights to hotels and cars!
Nice site Easy and quick to use and haven't had any problems
Adventure Awaits This app has sparked a new opportunity for spontaneous travel. I love how easy it is to use and how excited I am every time I find new deals.
Great Great overall. If only there's an option for using google maps instead of Apple maps when booking hotels
Great app Overall, very functional app. Was very useful with my trip to Austin, TX both finding the flight as well as getting a car rental.
Love it I love this app. You can enter specific travel plans and it will alert you of the lowest prices. I've been able to monitor 2 upcoming vacations.
Best place to find all travel needs!! I highly recommend. Their prices are usually always the cheapest! ;)
Very user friendly! Would definitely recommend to friends!

Great money saving app I always book my airfare ticket through Kayak and it saved me more money. Actually my travel agent was not able to compete with kayak so I left him and now my new travel agent is Kayak.
Very useful My only recommendation would be to make the notification for price changes easier to activate in the search process

Kayak app I think this app is put together nicely and has options and in depth analysis of rooms and fights and allows u to filter out the unnecessary options that most booking site try to add on to ur purchase. Great app.

Ruined by "Clean Design" App used to make sense and I used it regularly. In a sprucing up effort (unnecessary), they've destroyed the functionality. The new filters are useless. All I want is to filter by price, stars, pets accepted, whatever, not this arbitrary "luxury", "family", "boutique", etc. garbage. Do the people designing/approving these changes actually travel?
Great app. Very helpful to get data from a high level from multiple sites and vendors (except southwest).
Very accurate This app is extremely reliable throughout all of their options. I found this app very helpful as a 1st time flyer.
Always accurate & reliable It's the perfect fast and reliable starting point to any trip
Good app Really intuitive app that is very easy to screen a wide variety of variables when searching for flights
Simple and Comprehensive Great app.  Simple interface with lots of useful features.  Definitely my first choice app to use when planning travels.
Love Kayak It's super awesome. Fast and on the go just as I need. I can book flights instantly where ever I am finding the cheapest, best flights out. It's the best thing every for me.
Easy to use Could be more intuitive but great for basic searching
2 thumbs up Great performance very responsive and helpful website
Perfect! It doesn't get much better. Easy to use, quick, all my travel needs in one place.
Amazing app! Makes life a lot easier when trying to book on the go for cheap!
Accurate and easy to use. The alerts feature really comes in handy.
Easy and fun I love this app because it is so easy to use. I check flights everyday to see the difference and the ones I like I ema to myself.
Superb looking but they removed the most vital function! I love the new UI but flexible date searches are no longer available!
Hawaii? Seems like on this app Hawaii doesn't exist so I have to use the website, which is fine but it would be more convenient to use the app. I wonder why I can't search for this state!!
This app is awesome Seriously found flights for half the price I found on any other flight
Excellent!! Very easy to navigate. Extremely quick and useful!! I'm so excited to plan all my upcoming trips right from my phone!!
Love this App I love to travel and this app has been my faithful companion. It's a breeze search for and booking flights. Great job with the recent design tweaks they've made!
Extremely helpful travel planner I can book cheap hotels and flights in a very convenient way now!
No complaints! Very user-friendly and fast. Haven't used it to book yet though...
Best travel app The best travel app, love how u can just forward your flight or hotel confirmation and it's added to your trips.
All you need! This is the only site I look at when researching flights/hotels. The filter options are great.
Excellent app Well done! Easy way to find best fares/hotels/rates on cars. Just wish our friends at Southwest and some others would get on board!
Easy! Easier than the computer search!
Perfect Talk about organization ...
Fast, accurate, easy to use Kayak works great on my iPhone and iPad and is my go-to app for all my travel plans and I'm a frequent traveler, for business and funsies
Surprised Used Kayak for the first time and actually had access to flights/rates which I could not attain directly with airline carrier.  Saved about $240!
I only use kayak :) I love kayak and use it buy all my plane tickets. I can never find any other sites that are cheaper. Will always use it!
Excellent Found great prices and deals! Glad I can book a flight, hotel and car rental all on one site!
Good app Good ad always use it bug has a bug dont display euro prices when u check it in ur currency hope they fix it
Great app! Love  this app.  List all fares and makes  it so easy to compare fares and times.  App much more convenient than online web page.
Great app. Easy to use. Filter and sort would be better if you could go max and min but otherwise perfect.
great app Works 100% excellent ! I just downloaded this app and bought a round trip international ticket in 4 minutes! Thanks a lot to the developers!
Fantastic! Love this app-- I spend all of my free time searching for flights because it's so easy and quick... Perfectly designed!!
If you're not using it Then you should be.  Best app for finding travel services and for travel management.
Legit clean app I love this app I'm able to book flights on the go and the layout of this app is easy to navigate and a really clean professional looking app.
My primary source I use Kayak to look up deals for all of my trips.  I love the sliding levers.  The updates are frequent and improve the experience.  Get this app!
Always Amazing Amazing to find this depth of search capability in a mobile app, it will take you anywhere in the world you want to go!
Useful travel tool I find myself using kayak and the app a lot to plan my trips. The payment interface is a little clunky to set up on the phone, but works great once it is.
Great product If you travel often, this is a must have product.
Great on-the-go app but crashes for new search Great to have this app. I'm constantly searching for national and international flights. Very easy to use interface.
Love it Navigation made easy maps of location of hotels amazing. It helps especially if your not familiar with city.

Very goof on the go!! It's not as developed and extended as the web-based service, but considering that we're on ver 1.5--it's pretty good and eventually will get there after a while. Kayak is one the greatest service online!!!
Amazingg This is what exactly what we need a simple search engine for flights. Thank you for creating such an app and making it free! Must have
New interface & features are great! Much more robust - easy to use. So far I've only researched flights but very impressed by speed and usability. Nice work!

Great App!! A great app for travelers. Has everything you need to plan and while on the go. Easy to use interface. Would have given 5 stars but was missing the St. Louis Airport which is a major airport compared to some listed. PLEASE ADD IT IN NEXT UPDATE!!
Sweet Like it better even than website though I accidentally keep hitting back button and erasing the filters I specified
This really works The program is far more as
Amazing app This app has everything built into it. They really seem to have thought of everything!
Great app! I really like the new changes. Easier to use. I especially like the cheapest, quickest, earliest tabs. Great improvement on a already great service.
Easy Site Use I've tried many travel booking Apps / sites Kayak is by far the simplest and easiest to navigate. Keep up the fine design Kayak THANKS!
So simple & straightforward Easy helpful app experience ...& lets me bookmark for price watching, which is my favorite feature!
Works great. Functional. Many option filters. Easy to understand. Very helpful.
Works great Just wish they'd go back to showing the seats left at that price. I haven't seen that recently.

GREAT APP! Use it all the time! Fantastic feature notifies you when a destination you're watching reaches your preset price! Got R/T non stop tix from LAX to NY for $230!!!! Only app I use to fly! Thanks for an awesome app guys.
Clean interface Really like the ability to save trips.
Excellent App to save money with! Great selection of prices in all areas! I seem to save quite a bit when I use this app!
A+ Easy I always use Kayak to compare my travel prices before booking. Great app with logical filters for finding the rights travels reservations.
Quick trip planner Essential for planning impromptu trips and check prices of fantasy trips.
Okay but less functionality The app and website used to have more controls and would let you search for more cities at once.
Still my go to travel app After all these years, Kayak is still the easiest, most streamlined app out there.
Love Kayak I've traveled two to three times as much since I started using kayak to find airfare and hotels. It's terrific and nothing beats their excellence in tracking rates.
Fast and Easy!!!!!! It's what we All want!!!,many Options friendly user Experience,and if on Top of that we're gonna save money It's the Perfect Traveler's App!!!!!
Great Travel Site Always reliable, accurate and saves me time when booking travel arrangements-an essential app for me!
Great app Thanks for helping me find the best prices for my trips for the past couple of years! Will always refer to, and recommend, this app!!
Practical! I especially love the flight tracker and packing list. I can organize everything I need for a trip in one app.
Best search engine for flights I only use kayak to search for the best available flights for my trips. A+++

author_name: Good App, Needs a Few Tweaks
review_body: Only travel app I consistently use... My first stop to book/check prices on flights.
Cheap Fare I discovered Kayak a few years ago and since then use it whenever I need to book a flight.  Invariably I find the cheapest fares here.  I love it!
Traveler This app has been my personal travel assistant for many years now. Couldn't live without it.
Perfect Excellent software and interface. Everything I could ask for In a travel app!!

üíúüè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåàüíú GREAT APP!!! I Love That I Can Search One Time & Kayak Will Offer to Set Up an Alert. Tap "Yes" & Kayak Will Do All The Work From That Point on. Consistent & Controllable To Any Device/Source You Decide. They've Yet to Let Me Down.
Great App!! Very convenient to use and has all the features available on the website.
My "go to" app for flight planning Love Kayak- easy to use. The Trip Alerts are extremely helpful. Highly recommend.
Great app! Love that it's a quick way to look up fares. I find myself using the app repeatedly. Definitely not disappointed!
Quite useful Use this app frequently to track flight prices
My travel partner app I find everything and use it to find great deals. My go to! I recommend to all my friends.
Use them a lot I use kayak a lot when looking for flights, hotels, cars, etc.. One stop searching.
Go-To Source Need to know the only way to get to Charleston when my airline gives me a 16-hour delay on my pre-dawn flight? Kayak.
Use it for all my travel needs So handy and easy to use. Best prices, and believe me I check and double check.
Love the price alerts The app has helped me find some great deals on travel with the price alert function.
Just great I have yet to find better flight prices elsewhere. The "hacker fares" are a particularly great feature. Car rental deals are amazing too.
Very useful Travel tools that help while you're traveling or while tracking loved ones enroute.
Easy to Use I love the kayak app. It makes finding everything in one place easy. With the exception of southwest flights because they only publish on their website, it's a great app.
Consistently reliable and fast Kayak is my go-to travel app. It's fast, easy to use and thorough. Highly recommend.
Definitive flight search app Kayak is a great website, but even so I'm surprised by how well designed he app is. Tons of functionality. Bravo.
Best for traveling! Smooth understanding and easy to use features. Always up to date.
Love the app. Let you find some very good deals without having to check around.
Pretty good most of the time If you don't mind switching planes and being in airports at all hours of the day and night it can save you a lot of money and time in booking.
Great Conveniently gathers all the information you're looking for, without killing time to search on your own. Try it.
So unbiased and Ray to use I end up booking usually through corporate travel, but I always find my best route on Kayak.
Very helpful This has made finding flights easier
Great way to compare This app makes it so easy to compare prices and find the right flight combinations.
Very easy to use Very stable and user friendly on I6+, even when I repeatedly checked different flight.
Great I only wish I could select # of stops preferred in order to avoided sifting through so many flights.
Very helpful Really enjoyed the trip planning feature where you can forward confirmation and they appear on your trip timeline.

Beware of price increases from quoted price to final price I booked a flight from HKG to LAS and it showed a price of $664 on Kayak. When I clicked "Book Now" it took me to the Delta airlines site and said that Delta would show the currency in HK dollars. I noticed after I booked the flight that it had charged me the equivalent of $935. Almost $300 more!  That's more than just a currency change.
Easy to use, saves so much time. I just used this app recently for the first time, and I was pleasantly surprised at the ease of use. I recommend it!
Helpfull Love having access to discount rates on my phone. Prices seem to be as competitive as any site, but the app user interface is better than any other.
Love it Love the trips feature. You email kayak all your trip confirmations and they make a trip outline for you. Keeps me organized.
This is is my first stop when planning a trip. I use this to plan trips a a series of one-way flights.
Easy to use No complaints. Always gets me the travel information that I need.

Compare I like this app because of the speed in giving me quotes. It saves me a lot of time. But I have noticed that there were flights that was cheaper than the ones listed. So I usually check my KAYAK first to compare.
Wrong prices Easy to use. Frequently the lowest price posted is erroneous. When you click through to actually book a car or hotel the price can be significantly higher.
Works pretty fine Pretty easy to use and navigate. Just wish that kayak posted the dates of departures/arrivals on itineraries that have multiple overnight flights or cross multiple time zones.
Really useful Everything I was looking for: price tracking, flight tracker, hotels, and car rental. Streamlined and great user interface.
Great app I love how simple it is to use the app!  I am usually very picky about apps, but not this one!  I really like it and would definitely recommend it.
My first place to check flights I love this app. It lets me plan flights easily. I mostly like the interface and the filters. I can find the best flight at the best price every time.

Used to be on point Kayak was our go to sure to access all travel prices but ever since they contracted with Southwest it's been a pain to access kayak; with their 'no price listed' until you 'book now' option it's a hassle. Bring the old way back!
Review Wish it had the option to narrow down search but for the most part easy to use and helpful.
Best rates I don't always buy from the app, but it always gives me a quick review of the best/cheapest flights, hotels, and car rentals.
I'm obsessed with this app I love love love this app. I would live if it would keep saved searches but I still got the best price for my trip on the net!  Definitely a keeper!
Slick, smooth. Easy Very intuitive, nice interface, makes finding a good value easy.  Glad it's available.
Great app Coming from someone who is traveling all the time, I have found the kayak app to be extremely helpful and informative!
Functionality! Very easy to read, navigate, and use. Displays consistently competitive prices and fares. I'm keeping this one.

Don't understand why people like this This app will give you many good deals and then redirect you to purchase. I try to purchase using the Orbitz option through this app, but you will not be able to because the purchase button is covered by other buttons in the app. This renders the app completely useless.
A great app finds deals your computer can't Your computer uses cookies to track your searches and raise prices. This finds good deals.
Great app Definitely makes booking everything a lot easier.
Very convenient! I check it at least twice a week!! And more than likely always buy my tickets straight from my phone!!
Easy to use Very easy to use and provide all the information I need to make a booking.
Excellent App This app can compare price, check flight status, buy tickets and lots of amazing function.
Updates Great app. I just updated the app on the sep 9th update and for some reason every time I open it it closes on its own. Please fix. Thanks!
Easy and fast Like the ability to look for hotels and flights on my phone. Very helpful.
Great app Very travel friendly app. Showed only what you need to know but allows you to filter/customize your search if needed. Great apppppppp
Looks right I haven't had it that long but seems fine! No issues.
Great and reliable application Works well and provides all the information in an easy format.
Most-used app has almost everything you need
Awesome Kayak always makes looking for a hotel or flight super fast. The app is easy to use and I love how easy they make it to compare prices!
Useful & user-friendly Just as useful as the desktop site (if not more so). My go-to app for hotel & flight info.
Top Notch Kayak saves me mad loot of flight bookings. It's also extremely convenient for hotel shopping and car rental. I'm new to this app, but so far, it rocks!
Works Has almost all the functionality of the website and easy to use
Great app Love having it on the go. I do wish it had the monthly fee calculator option that the full site has; we often flex our dates based on that.
Great App. Traveling with my family for a year. This app is great. I love the simplicity. I use it all the time. Wish that the airline apps were as we'll written as this.
Dang It was just super simple to use. I really like it. You can see a ton of different air lines arts witch makes it so much simpler to find a flight.
Excellent app It makes searching for flights very easy and it comes with a nice looking user interface. Get it.
Fantastic app Beautiful, simple app for travel. I email all itineraries to kayak and they instantly show up in the app, with flight numbers, gate changes, etc.
Excellent travel tool I love using the application and he website to track flight and hotel prices. Simple and easy to use. Highly recommended!
Easy app Great app to use. It remembers what I was searching for and the selection process to find what I need is easy. User friendly fast.
Great app! Very convenient and a great way to book a vacation! I would highly recommend you download it and use it.
Works well Quicker than their website. I had no problems at all.
One stop shopping for travel Great app! Love how it makes it so easy to find a good deal! Saved me lots of $$ when I took my last trip.
Great on iPad, not in iPhone Works great on my iPad, but the iPhone app constantly crashes and can't complete a search without crashing.
Great app Wonderful! Now I can buy my ticket more fast. Recommend anyone wanting to travel by plane and or get a hotel with it should get this free app.
Exceptional site Always the best options to travel, used them numerous time domestic and international with excellent results.  Their support line is decent as well.
Good but crashes sometimes In the beginning it was working well, but then it started to crash on me and I had to start the app again
Very helpful Great app and great website. Kayak is super helpful when it comes to comparing the price of flights. I use this every time I am planning a trip.
Love this app Very well done. Considering how
- This app's interface is even more convenient than that on the web site.
Best Deals Kayak consistently found the best prices for me, although it is sometimes difficult to figure out the routes without lots of checking. (Best Price often isn't the best route).
Excellent! I love how you can upload photos from your phone!! It is so much easier than uploading from your PC.
Nightflyer 1st time user.  Found it very user friendly with useful features not found in other travel sites.
excellent App wow I was excited to use this app on my iPhone, I found exactly what I want in this app. thank you kayak.... definetly this should be a paid app... Very Quick and Easy
Efficient and effective This app eliminated trolling multiple website and still delivered lower rates than if I had went directly to the vendor!
Useful for often travelers I like the application, is pretty handy for people who travel, of course I would like more filters, better filters like if I travel with a child
Kayak Rocks Been using for years. But this app takes it to a new level of convenience.
Kayak app = Kayak website Does everything the website does (and doesn't). Good app for quick travel prices and info. Don't know if I'd buy tickets on my phone though
Very advanced app I'm very pleased with this app
My go to App for all Travel needs ! Kayak is an amazing app for all your travel needs. It even helps you book international flights ! Amazing app !
Kayak app Great overall app for travel needs. Would be nice if there was an easier way to differentiate distance when searching specific parts of a location.  I.e hotels near landmarks.
Kayak or nothing! Great website and phenomenal app. Easy to use. Easy to book. Gajillions (it's a word) of options. I'm on this app at least twice a day!
Very useful app!!! The best app for travelers!!! Very convenient, easy to use, works fast! Most important, great deals on flights.
Really useful. The kayak app is a great version of the website; it's intuitive, appealing, and easy. I'm using it to plan my upcoming trip and it has been invaluable. Use it; you won't be sorry.
Fix the app I made site I increased my memory using "free memory" before using this app. based on the reviews I read. I even sit down the phone.
Great travel search app This app is great for searching for flights. It's much easier than going on safari and using airline websites.
Very useful App I use this almost every day to track fares. The interface could use some work to make it more user-friendly, but it gets the job done.
Crashes !! Every time I tend to search for flights, it CRASHES !!!...tried uninstalling and re-installing...still of no use.
Kayak made their app even better Kayak keeps adding new features every month or so. Version 2.0 has a lot of new things that are not mentioned on the iTunes page:
the icon...? What's up with this new icon..? totaly nonsense... I deleted this app because of that.
Excellent App Love the App - just like the website - very easy - helped me out a few times when needing a quick one stop price
Excellent travel planning tool It is fast and gives all the options. Available with great ease of use
Travel made easy Have used it for many trips and I love it. Easy to use and keeps my trips all in one spot.
Definitely recommend Has helped me find flights for lower prices, it's also useful in just getting a gauge on trip costs.
Good comparison app This is a good app if you're looking for the best price on a trip. Easy to set your own parameters for what is important to you and then watch the price.
Open to trips tab Kayak is my go to travel app, but I wish I could have the option to open the app to the trips tab every time.
Glitches Many glitches like prices not showing, app crashing, internal errors with kayak servers - otherwise fine when working.
Favorite trip organization app Kayak is my favorite app for organizing confirmations and trip details. Their search functions are top notch also.
Great app I especially love the Explorer function that lets you look all over the world for flight deals.
Not bad but sometimes not accurate I like the mobile app but it can definitely be less accurate than the desktop app sometimes. Not sure why.
Great App This app is so quick and easy.  I love the save trip feature and I like that I can find low cost fares of all airlines and all cities on a whim!  Thanks Kayak!!
Great App Love the app and the ability to set multiple alerts.  Filters are really great and would like to see the capability of the Price Alerts to store the filters selected.

Prices inflated or not accurate Folks you are better off using Orbitz. Kayak is not giving a best price for consumer. I made the mistake of booking in kayak with Alaska Airlines from SF to Seattle, only to find out the same itinerary with same airline comes almost 60 bucks cheaper in orbitZ. (200 round-trip vs 260 by kayak) Not sure kayak's search and deals are good. I  am stopping to use kayak anymore.
First time First time using kayak. It seems very easy to get around and it also seems very competitive for pricing.
Does the job I use it mainly for quick searches. Always delivers fast and complete results
Great business resource Use it for weekly business travel!  Love seeing all options in one place
Great App, easy to use and very helpful. Very good App that translate all the usefulness of Kayak'a webpage into a more comfortable on the go experience while not losing any feature.
Awesome Best travel app! I have used so many apps to book trips and have finally settled on using Kayak for all my flight plans
Great Tool Love using the many options and filters to find just the right flight.
Live to save and fly This app has saved me money and time. We all know time is money too. Thank you for the savings!
Easiest and cheapest tix, always I've been checking multiple sites for all my travel to South America, Mexico, Caribbean, and Ukraine from the States. Kayak pretty much always wins.

Buyer beware -- non- refundable! I just booked my first hotel using the Kayak site. No mention whatsoever that the room I reserved for NYC biz trip was non-refundable. Only found out once confirmation email arrived. When I complained to Kayak they wrote that I should have read fine print! Apparently all bookings on this site are non-refundable unless otherwise noted. Horrendous scam! Buyer beware.
Not as good as the web but easy to use Straight forward and search many airlines, except the Southwest. Easy to use and apply the filters.
Easily one of the best travel apps anywhere today....and I've used them all!!! Great app.  Probably one of the best apps out there for travel !!!
Best travel App I've ever used Very intuitive to use and with few steps you find what you need for your travel
Quick and easy Super easy, love that it gives so many options
Service, not app Use all the time. The app freezes sometimes, but the convenience of being able to use kayak on the run is all I need.
